title: Credit card fraud alert
text: One of the transactions on your credit card might have been fraudulent, please confirm you paid 50$ at ARCO PETROL STATION in san francisco
denyConfirmMsg: Are you certain you wish to report this transaction as likely fraudulent ?
denyMsg: Our fraud team will contact you shortly

actions.name: I don't recognize that transaction
actions.confirmationMsg: Our fraud team will contact you shortly
